datasetParam.name: ds_gene_identifiers
datasetParam.help: Enter a list of one or more comma or new-line separated gene identifiers, or select a file to upload.

enumParam.name: taxon
enumParam.help: Selected taxon; cannot be revised. To search against mouse genes, please begin a new upload.

stringParam.name: fold_change
stringParam.help: Enter a non-negative number specifying the minimum (log2) fold change threshold. In the result summary, fold change will be reported as positive numbers for up-regulated genes and negative numbers for down-regulated genes

flatVocabParam.name: comparison
flatVocabParam.help: Select a treatment (for comparison against an untreated control).

flatVocabParam.name: regulated_dir
flatVocabParam.help:
• Select up-regulated to retrieve genes that have higher expression in the comparator relative to the reference.

  • Select down-regulated to retrieve genes that have lower expression in the comparator relative to the reference.

  • Select both to retrieve genes that meet the fold change cutoff, regardless of regulation direction.
